macros.sourceContext:
|
    |
  • The non-standard -moz-box and -moz-inline-box {{CSSxRef("display")}} values have been hidden from web content (Firefox bug 1496961).
    • > |
  • The non-standard {{CSSxRef("::-moz-tree")}} pseudo-elements have been hidden from web content (Firefox bug 1496961).
    • ^ |
  • The layout.css.filters.enabled preference has been removed; CSS filters can no longer be disabled (Firefox bug 1408841).
    • |
  • A previous change — to swap the values of the 2-value {{cssxref("overflow")}} syntax so block is specified first and inline second (Firefox bug 1481866) — has been reverted (Firefox bug 1492567). See Bug 1481866 comment 14 for why.

title: Firefox 64 for developers
summary: This article provides information about the changes in Firefox 64 that will affect developers. Firefox 64 was released on December 11, 2018.
